exceptions.exn: In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid this : nat_ordType tag : nat m : seq nat from, round : nat next_data : data lg : Log pt : nat_eqType pt_in_pts : pt \\in pts Unable to unify "Type" with "E_consume_external d i this tag m from (fun d : dstatelet => pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt)".

I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
E_consume_external = fun (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (this : nat_ordType) (tag : nat) (m : seq nat) (from : nat) (P : dstatelet -> Type) => coh d -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> ~~ internal_msg tag from this -> P d -> P {| dstate := upd this (loc this d) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} : dstatelet -> mid -> nat_ordType -> nat -> seq nat -> nat -> (dstatelet -> Type) -> Type Arguments E_consume_external _ _ _ _%nat_scope _%seq_scope _%nat_scope _%function
nid = nat : Set

Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType

prep_no_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), State.tag m = prep_no -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]

getStP_K : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP Hnin C pf = m
prep_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)]
this_not_pts : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
pt_PhaseOneE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
getStP : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> PStateT
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
pt_PhaseOneE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (lg : Log) (pt from : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (to : nat) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_PhaseOne d r nd lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r nd lg pt

cn_pts_in : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (this : nat_eqType), this \in cn :: pts -> this \in nodes cn pts others
getStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> Log
getStCL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (l : Label) (this : nat_eqType) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)) (N : this \in cn :: pts), loc this (getStatelet j l) = loc this (getStatelet i l) -> getStL pf' (cn_pts_in others N) = getStL pf (cn_pts_in others N)
getStLE : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (l : Label) (this : nat_eqType) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)) (N : this \in cn :: pts), loc this (getStatelet j l) = loc this (getStatelet i l) -> getStL pf' (cn_pts_in others N) = getStL pf (cn_pts_in others N)
getStPE : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (l : Label) (n : nat_eqType) (i j : state) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (C' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others), n \in pts -> loc n (getStatelet j l) = loc n (getStatelet i l) -> getStP Hnin C' pf = getStP Hnin C pf
Exports.getStPE : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (l : Label) (n : nat_eqType) (i j : state) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (C' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others), n \in pts -> loc n (getStatelet j l) = loc n (getStatelet i l) -> getStP Hnin C' pf = getStP Hnin C pf
getStL_Kp : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
getStL_Kc : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
pt_state_soupE : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : soup) (h : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt n : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt != n -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n h (dstate d); dsoup := ds |} ps lg pt
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
cn_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), cn != n -> coh d -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} cs lg
pt_not_cn : forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt != cn
nodes = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) => [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> seq nid Arguments nodes _ (_ _)%seq_scope
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
soupCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> exists y : nat, cohMsg cn pts ms y)] : nid -> seq nid -> Pred soup Arguments soupCoh _ _%seq_scope
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
pt_PhaseTwoResponded = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : seq nat) (l : seq (bool * seq nat)) (b : bool) (pt : nid) => [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (b, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] : dstatelet -> nat -> seq nat -> seq (bool * seq nat) -> bool -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoResponded _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%seq_scope _%bool_scope
TPCCoh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes cn pts others])
